title: THE CLOCK IS TICKING
subtitle: are you ready to guess?
fetchErrorMsg: Failed to fetch the current time. Please try again.

infoModal.searchOrRandom: Search for any place or hit 'Random Location' for a surprise spot!
infoModal.enterTime: Enter the current hour and minute in that location.
infoModal.hitOk: Hit 'OK' to check if your guess is correct. If not, you'll see the right time.
infoModal.viewGuesses: View your successful guesses and see how well you know the world's time zones!
